NewsItem.HEADLINE: RAN Expert INSIGHT 2017.2 Cable+Mobile
NewsItem.SUMMARY: This strategic report investigates Massive MIMO testing and the impact on manufacturing of mobile infrastructure
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: Recognizing that RRH units will no longer include coaxial connectors for easy testing, this report investigates the impact on manufacturing of Massive MIMO active antenna systems and radios. How will test chambers be used, and how will it impact the industry's ability to deliver millions of radio units?
